thread.title: Spanish stocks - Factors to watch on Thursday

title: Spanish stocks - Factors to watch on Thursday
text:
March 29, 2018 / 5:56 AM / Updated 5 minutes ago Spanish stocks - Factors to watch on Thursday Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
The following Spanish stocks may be affected by newspaper reports and other factors on Thursday. Reuters has not verified the newspaper reports, and cannot vouch for their accuracy: IBERDROLA 
Iberdrola’s affiliate Avangrid’s subsidiary Central Maine Power chosen in bid to deliver clean energy to New England grid. NH HOTELS 
Fitch Upgrades NH Hotel Group to ‘B+’; Outlook Positive. 
For today’s European market outlook double click on.

For IBEX constituent stocks highlight .IBEX in the command box and press the F3 button on your keyboard
